One Seed - Ostris: A universal seed node with numerous output formats
Text Box - Ostris: Just a simple textbox for now
LLM Pipe Loader - Ostris: Loads an LLM with diffusers from HuggingFace. Use with Prompt Upsampling
LLM Prompt Upsampling - Ostris: Uses an LLM to expand your prompt into a more complex prompt with more descriptive detail.
Save Image Direct - Ostris: Allows you to save an image to any path along with a caption text file with it.
Batch Image Loader - Ostris: Loads random images from a directory and their caption files if it exists.
